name: xrayku
keywords: xray vmess vless trojan shadowsocks socks tor

AA.description: Novice users only need to modify the following AUUID and click the Deploy app button at the end of the page to start deployment
AA.value: If there is an error, please check the parameter format or try several times. To use custom parameters, be sure to fully understand their meaning first

AUUID.description: UUID充当各个配置的路径和账号密码，建议修改和妥善保存,可生成UUID的网站: https://www.uuidgenerator.net

CADDYIndexPage.description: 自定义CADDY部署完成后点击View的显示页面，参考：https://github.com/mixool/xrayku/blob/master/etc/CADDYIndexPage.md

CONFIGCADDY.description: 自定义网络地址读取配置运行CADDY，不熟悉CADDY配置的请勿修改

CONFIGXRAY.description: 自定义网络地址读取配置运行xray，不熟悉xray配置的请勿修改

ParameterSSENCYPT.description: SS加密方式，查看支持协议: https://www.v2fly.org/config/protocols/shadowsocks.html

StoreFiles.description: 自定义网络地址读取存储文件列表
